library.generateTexture:
lvv = little/low voxel variations
#00 metal varied white, metallic, voxel variations #01 metal smooth white, metallic, lvv #02 plastic rough white, non metallic, lvv #03 emissive metal metallic #04 concrete grey with light and dark dots #05 dark glowy metal dark, metallic with little glow #06 energy (not bolts) white strong glow (use with emissives!) #07 photovoltaics blueish metallic, lvv #08 grey metal smooth grey, metallic, lvv #09 black plastic rough black, non metallic, lvv #10 white plastic smooth white, non metallic, lvv #11 energy (impact) different white strong glow (use with emissives!) #12 display #13 dark concrete grey with light and dark dots #14 dark metal dark, metallic #15 emis dark plastic non metallic, lvv #16 emis light plastic #17 darkish metal dark metallic #18 dark plastic rough dark plastic rought #19 light source light source, emissive #20 grey plastic smooth grey, non metallic, lvv #21 black black, non metallic, lvv #22 energy (bolts) white strong glow (use with emissives!) different moment when changes to full from base #23 corrosion white strong glow (use with emissives!) #24 medium concrete grey with light and dark dots #25 darker plastic rough darker plastic rought #26 light smooth concrete smooth concrete
#224 sand
colours #00 main #32 first (red) #64 second (green) #96 energy ammo #128 energy health #160 third (brown) #192 fourth (blue) #224 customs . .
